sentences.en: Add the mint and allow the flavours to mingle.
sentences.cn: 加入薄荷，把各种味道混合起来。

sentences.en: Go out of your way to mingle with others at the wedding.
sentences.cn: 去跟婚礼上的其他人聊聊。

sentences.en: He condescended to mingle with the workers.
sentences.cn: 他屈尊与工人们交往.

sentences.en: He did not mingle with the newcomers at first.
sentences.cn: 他最初不与新来的人来往.

sentences.en: He used to train in a local park and mingle with other runners.
sentences.cn: 他过去常在地方公园里锻炼，并与其他跑步的人相交往。

sentences.en: Her tears mingled with the blood on her face.
sentences.cn: 她的泪水和脸上的血混在了一起。

sentences.en: If we mingle with the crowd we shall not be noticed.
sentences.cn: 如果我们混在人群里,就不会被人注意了.

sentences.en: If we mingle with the crowd, we should not be noticed.
sentences.cn: 如果我们混在人群中, 就不会被注意到.

sentences.en: In both types of surgery beauty and mental healing subtly mingle, he claims, and both benefit health.
sentences.cn: 所有的手术类型中，美和心灵治疗微妙地混合，他声称，都有益于健康。

sentences.en: Men mingle more and more.
sentences.cn: 人们越来越混合在一起.

sentences.en: Mingle these two substances before the experiment.
sentences.cn: 实验之前先将这两种物质混合起来.

sentences.en: Note the sincerity of our repentant tears; mingle in our simple sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 注意我们真诚悔改的眼泪, 和我们一同作纯朴的奉献吧.

sentences.en: Oil will not mingle with water.
sentences.cn: 油和水不相融.

sentences.en: One of the hostess's duties is to mingle with the guests.
sentences.cn: 女主人的职责之一是与客人们交际.

sentences.en: Several streams mingle in this river on their way to the sea.
sentences.cn: 几条小溪在注入大海的途中汇入这条河.

sentences.en: The sounds of laughter and singing mingled in the evening air.
sentences.cn: 笑声和歌声交织在夜空中。

sentences.en: The two rivers join and mingle their waters.
sentences.cn: 那两条河汇而为一.

sentences.en: The two rivers mingle their waters here.
sentences.cn: 这两条河在这里汇合起来了.

sentences.en: The two rivers mingle their waters when they join.
sentences.cn: 两河相会时汇流在一起.

sentences.en: You can't mingle oil and water.
sentences.cn: 你不能将油和水混合在一起.

trans.tran_en: if two feelings, sounds, smells etc mingle, they mix together with each other
if two feelings, sounds, smells etc mingle, they mix together with each other
to combine or make one thing combine with another
